      • logIn

        public void logIn​(java.lang.String u,
                  java.lang.String p)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Function that log in a user. It checks if the name is and password coincide with the user ones. In addition the user shouldn't be banned
        Parameters:
        u - username we want to log in.
        p - password we want to check.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkExpiredProjects

        public java.util.List<Project> checkExpiredProjects()
        Function that checks if there are any expired projects at the real time and returns them. This cannot be tested because it needs real time (30 real days passed from the creation of the project).
        Returns:
        expired List with all expired projects

      • checkExpiredProjects

        public java.util.List<Project> checkExpiredProjects​(java.time.LocalDate actualDate)
        Function that checks if there are any expired projects at a time passed by argument (as if it was the real time) and returns them.
        Parameters:
        actualDate - date that is used with modifiable Dates if we want to check the expired projects
        Returns:
        expired List with all expired projects

      • getRegisteredUsers
